title: Border, late 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace made in Lille style with heavy outlining thread
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border of Lille-style lace edged with a garland formed by floral blossoms in a serpentine arrangement. Fond: maglia de Spagna. Modes: fond à cinq trous.

late 18th century. Medium: linen
